text: Mohamud Muse Hersi (, ; 1 July 1937 - 8 February 2017), nicknamed "Adde", was a Somali politician. He was the President of the Puntland region from 8 January 2005 to 8 January 2009. He was a military general until the 1970s. Muse Hersi died on 8 February 2017 in the United Arab Emirates, aged 79. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:African military people Category:Generals Category:Heads of state Category:Somali Muslims Category:Somali politicians
title: Mohamud Muse Hersi
